ctl:suite.name: sos:suite
ctl:suite.ctl:title: SOS 2.0 Compliance Test Suite
ctl:suite.ctl:description: Verifies that an SOS 2.0 implementation complies with a given conformance class.

ctl:test.name: sos:Main
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The implementation satisfies all applicable assertions.

body.h2: Compliance test suite for Sensor Observation Service (SOS) 2.0
body.p: Information about this test suite can be found here.
Please provide a URL from which a capabilities document can be retrieved.
Please select how to send this request.
Please select whether to run all tests or just selected tests.
If you want to run selected tests, please select the checkboxes for the tests you want to run.
Please press the "Start" button to start testing.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

body.h2: Please select URL for each interfaces:
body.p: Please press the "Submit" button to start testing.

ctl:message.select: concat('Run GetCapabilities test via GET:',$IsGetCapabilities-GET,', URL:',$GetCapabilities-URL)
concat('Run DescribeSensor test via GET: ',$IsDescribeSensor-GET,', URL:',$DescribeSensor-URL)
concat('Run GetObservation test via GET: ',$IsGetObservation-GET,', URL:',$GetObservation-URL)
concat('Run GetFeatureOfInterest test via GET: ',$IsGetFeatureOfInterest-GET,', URL:',$GetFeatureOfInterest-URL)
concat('Run GetObservationById test via GET: ',$IsGetObservationById-GET,', URL:',$GetObservationById-URL)

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: If DeleteSensor Operation is supported by service, the DeleteSensor operation must support Http-post .

ctl:message.select: concat('Run DeleteSensor test via GET: false, URL:',$DeleteSensor-URL)
concat('Run GetResultTemplate test via GET: ',$IsGetResultTemplate-GET,', URL:',$GetResultTemplate-URL)
concat('Run GetResult test via GET: ',$IsGetResult-GET,', URL:',$GetResult-URL)

xsl:variable.name: test01
xsl:variable.select: $test0101 or $test0102 or $test0103 or $test0104 or $test0105 or $test0106 or $test0107 or $test0108 or $test0109 or $test0110 or $test0111

xsl:variable.name: test03
xsl:variable.select: $test0301 or $test0302 or $test0303 or $test0304 or $test0305 or $test0306 or $test0307 or $test0308 or $test0309

xsl:variable.name: test04
xsl:variable.select: $test0401 or $test0402 or $test0403 or $test0404 or $test0405 or $test0406 or $test0407 or $test0408 or $test0409 or $test0410 or $test0411

xsl:variable.name: test05
xsl:variable.select: $test0501 or $test0502 or $test0503 or $test0504 or $test0505 or $test0506 or $test0507 or $test0508 or $test0509 or $test0510 or $test0511 or $test0512 or $test0513 or $test0514 or $test0515 or $test0516 or $test0517 or $test0518 or $test0519 or $test0520

xsl:variable.name: test06
xsl:variable.select: $test0601 or $test0602 or $test0603 or $test0604 or $test0605 or $test0606 or $test0607 or $test0608 or $test0609 or $test0610 or $test0611 or $test0612 or $test0613 or $test0614 or $test0615

xsl:variable.name: test07
xsl:variable.select: $test0701 or $test0702 or $test0703 or $test0704 or $test0705 or $test0706 or $test0707 or $test0708 or $test0709

xsl:variable.name: test13
xsl:variable.select: $test1301 or $test1302 or $test1303 or $test1304 or $test1305 or $test1306 or $test1307 or $test1308 or $test1309 or $test1310 or $test1311

xsl:variable.name: test14
xsl:variable.select: $test1401 or $test1402 or $test1403 or $test1404 or $test1405 or $test1406 or $test1407 or $test1408 or $test1409 or $test1410 or $test1411 or $test1412
